author: tomdz
msg: Added read-support for the Torque/Turbine extensions BOOLEANINT/BOOLEANCHAR

author: snicoll
msg: - MNG-1461: custom application.xml can now be specified properly. Overrides any other file found in the source directories

- MNG-1444: added directory scanner to exclude common directories (subversion, CVS files, etc). Added earSourceIncludes and earSourceExcludes properties to specify the list of tokens to include and exclude respectively.

author: bodewig
msg: replace old avalon with newer excalibur dependencies
